name: Simply
description: We analyze presales and young projects on the market and make them simple for you. A new crypto project is not just “a gambling decision”, it is a business model, it is a team that performs it and it is a technological contract that supports it. We take care of analyzing each pre-sale, and we create a report in simple words about Security, Business Model and more, allowing you to make a better and informed decision about whether to invest or not.
